metadata.title: CVE-2024-46817 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Stop amdgpu_dm initialize when stream nums greater than 6[Why]Coverity reports OVERRUN warning. Should abort amdgpu_dminitialize.[How]Return failure to amdgpu_dm_init.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
